basic_information.scholarship_name: Verlin Richardson Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Chemistry or Chemistry - Forensic Science. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Chemistry or Chemistry Forensics Science major 3.0 GPA or above Undergraduate student Two faculty letters of recommendation

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
